bibl.title: The Dyscolus or Misanthropus of Menander of Athens (342-292 B.C.). Translated under the Title The Old Grouch or The Misanthropist, but also Called The Curmudgeon.
bibl.seg: Post Levi Arnold, The Dyscolus or Misanthropus of Menander of Athens (342-292 B.C.). Translated under the Title The Old Grouch or The Misanthropist, but also Called The Curmudgeon.
